channel.title: Animations
channel.description: Can someone who is somewhat knowledgeable in animations release some [u]useful[/u] resources so that we can progress this aspect of the RSPS scene? And why hasn't anyone brought this up before?

item.title: Animations
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This section is meant for requesting assistance with any issues you’ve encountered while developing, not making requests.

Read full topic

item.title: Animations
item.dc:creator: @MeeE59 MeeE59
item.description:
@MeeE59 wrote:

Perhaps one reason that nothing has been brought up:

Animations are handled client-sided. You seem to have posted in the Server section.

However, I am also interested in animation. I recommend looking at RSPoser.

Read full topic
